Language Manager
CONTACT INFORMATION: Enter your Company name, Manager first and last name, and email address.
CREATE FROM PROSPECT: To create a new customer from an existing prospect, enter the prospect # to be copied and click the "Copy" button.

Course
Lessons
Upload Image File
Click the Browse button to select an image (.gif file) from your personal computer. After you have selected the desired image file, click the Submit button to upload it to the system.
Upload Home Page
Click the Browse button to select a web page (.htm file) from your personal computer. After you have selected the desired web page, click the Submit button to upload it to the system.
Image Manager
Return To Pages

To include graphics on your pages -- click "Browse" to select an image file from your computer, then click "Submit". See Frequently Asked Questions for help on how to include graphics in the Page Editor. The files must have a "jpg" or "gif" file extension and are limited to 50K in file size, although the file size should be minimized to prevent users from having to wait for long file downloads.
The following image files have already been uploaded. Click on the filename to preview the image or delete to remove the image.
Upload Referrals
Select a file to upload that contains pairs of references on separate lines to identify which member was referred by which other member. (123 456)
